pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Wise & Bright 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Supports mental clarity and concentration.
Improves cognitive performance, memory recall and learning ability.

Wanderlust Wise & Bright is a consciously created blend of plant actives. Brahmi supports brain function, mental clarity, focus and concentration, improves cognitive performance and enhances learning ability. Ginkgo improves memory recall and supports healthy blood circulation. Gotu Kola is traditionally used in Ayurvedic Medicine to promote mental clarity, intelligence and wisdom.

Size: 60 Capsules

Warnings

Contains sulfites.

Talk to an Ayurvedic practitioner/health professional if you are unsure if this medicine is right for you.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
Bacopa monnieri (Brahmi) whole plant ext. dry, cone. stand 150mg
derived from min. dry 3g
Equiv. bacosides calculated as bacoside A 67.5mg
Ginkgo biloba (Ginkgo) leaf ext. dry. cone. stand. 60mg
Derived from min. dry 3g
Equiv. ginkgo flavon glycosides 14.4 mg
Equiv. ginkgolides and bilobalide 3.6mg
Centella asiatica (Gotu Kola) leaf ext. dry. conc. 150mg
Derived from dry 1.5mg
Rosmarinus officinafis (Rosemary) leaf ext. dry. conc. 50mg
Derived from dry 250mg


No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take two capsules daily or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a cool, dry
place. Do not use if cap seal or
inner seal is missing or broken.
